inputs.doc: If set, run strelka2 instead of strelka version 1

inputs.label: Don't delete temp files
inputs.doc: If set to 1, will not delete large temporary Pindel output

inputs.label: assembly name for VEP annotation
inputs.doc: Either GRCh37 or GRCh38 currently accepted

inputs.label: VEP cache .tar.gz
inputs.doc: .tar.gz compressed VEP Cache file will be written to"./vep-cache"
